author: Simon Difford
description: Sugar balances the citrus juice while the spirit fortifies and the carbonate lengthens.
name: Sling (Generic Name)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
